speaker: Emily
text: I wish I had taken time off sooner. I didn’t realize how burned out I was.
ipa: aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd ˈteɪkən taɪm ɔf ˈsunɚ | aɪ ˈdɪdənt ˈɹiəˌlaɪz haʊ bɝnd aʊt aɪ wəz
stress: I WISH I had TAKEN time off SOONER. I DIDN’T REALIZE how BURNED OUT I was.
linking:
"had taken" → /hæd ˈteɪkən/ (d + t linking)
"burned out" → /bɝnd aʊt/ (d + oʊ linking)

speaker: Raj
text: Yeah, you should have said something. We all noticed, but we didn’t want to push you.
ipa: jæ | ju ʃʊd əv sɛd ˈsʌmθɪŋ | wi ɔl ˈnoʊtɪst | bət wi ˈdɪdənt wɑnt tu pʊʃ ju
stress: Yeah, you SHOULD HAVE SAID something. We all NOTICED, but we DIDN’T WANT to PUSH you.
linking:
"should have" → /ʃʊd əv/ (d + əv linking)
"push you" → /pʊʃ ju/ (sh + y linking)

speaker: Emily
text: Thanks… But if I had spoken up earlier, I might not have reached that breaking point.
ipa: θæŋks | bət ɪf aɪ hæd ˈspoʊkən ʌp ˈɝliɚ | aɪ maɪt nɑt hæv ɹitʃt ðæt ˈbɹeɪkɪŋ pɔɪnt
stress: Thanks… But if I had SPOKEN UP EARLIER, I MIGHT NOT have REACHED that BREAKING POINT.
linking:
"spoken up" → /ˈspoʊkən ʌp/ (n + u linking)
"breaking point" → /ˈbɹeɪkɪŋ pɔɪnt/ (ŋ + p linking)

speaker: Raj
text: True. And if your team had supported you more proactively, things would have looked different now.
ipa: tɹu | ænd ɪf jʊɚ tim hæd səˈpɔɹtɪd ju mɔɹ proʊˈæktɪvli | θɪŋz wʊd əv lʊkt ˈdɪfɚənt naʊ
stress: True. And if your TEAM had SUPPORTED you more PROACTIVELY, THINGS would have LOOKED DIFFERENT now.
linking:
"supported you" → /səˈpɔɹtɪd ju/ (d + y linking)
"looked different" → /lʊkt ˈdɪfɚənt/ (t + d linking)

speaker: Emily
text: Yeah. But honestly, if I weren’t always trying to prove myself, I would have asked for help months ago.
ipa: jæ | bət ˈɑnəstli | ɪf aɪ wɚnt ˈɔlweɪz ˈtɹaɪɪŋ tu pɹuv maɪˈsɛlf | aɪ wʊd əv æskt fɔɹ hɛlp mʌnθs əˈɡoʊ
stress: Yeah. But HONESTLY, if I WEREN’T ALWAYS TRYING to PROVE MYSELF, I WOULD HAVE ASKED for HELP months ago.
linking:
"prove myself" → /pɹuv maɪˈsɛlf/ (v + m linking)
"asked for" → /æskt fɔɹ/ (t + f linking)

speaker: Raj
text: That hits home. I wish I didn’t feel the same pressure sometimes.
ipa: ðæt hɪts hoʊm | aɪ wɪʃ aɪ ˈdɪdənt fil ðə seɪm ˈpɹɛʃɚ ˈsʌmtaɪmz
stress: That HITS HOME. I WISH I didn’t FEEL the same PRESSURE sometimes.
linking:
"feel the" → /fil ðə/ (l + th linking)
"pressure sometimes" → /ˈpɹɛʃɚ ˈsʌmtaɪmz/ (r + s linking)

speaker: Raj
text: Yeah. If I hadn’t taken on so many responsibilities, I might have maintained a better balance.
ipa: jæ | ɪf aɪ ˈhædənt ˈteɪkən ɑn soʊ ˈmɛni ɹɪˌspɑnsəˈbɪlətiz | aɪ maɪt hæv meɪnˈteɪnd ə ˈbɛtɚ ˈbæləns
stress: Yeah. If I HADN’T TAKEN ON so many RESPONSIBILITIES, I MIGHT have MAINTAINED a BETTER BALANCE.
linking:
"taken on" → /ˈteɪkən ɑn/ (n + o linking)
"maintained a" → /meɪnˈteɪnd ə/ (d + a linking)

speaker: Emily
text: It’s hard. But if we keep ignoring our limits, burnout will just keep coming back.
ipa: ɪts hɑɹd | bət ɪf wi kip ɪɡˈnɔɹɪŋ aʊɚ ˈlɪmɪts | ˈbɝnˌaʊt wɪl dʒəst kip ˈkʌmɪŋ bæk
stress: It’s HARD. But if we KEEP IGNORING our LIMITS, BURNOUT will just KEEP COMING BACK.
linking:
"keep ignoring" → /kip ɪɡˈnɔɹɪŋ/ (p + i linking)
"coming back" → /ˈkʌmɪŋ bæk/ (ŋ + b linking)
